DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: I see that you've already settled well in my world.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: I should start demanding more from you...

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: I hope you managed to gather the cotton.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
